original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kāyaṁ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….

analyzed: ▁su p paṭicchann o ▁ antara ghar e ▁gam issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁su p paṭicchann ena ▁ antara ghar e ▁gantabb aṃ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca kāyaṁ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁kāy aṃ ▁vivar itvā ▁ antara ghar e ▁gacchati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
